experience.title: AI Engineer

experience.title: Graduate Intern
experience.description: Reduced audio quality estimation error for ChromeOS by 45% using a self-supervised learning approach. The method leverages large-scale unlabelled audio data from publicly available datasets and internal company datasets to improve the feature representations (audio encoder)
